body_html:
I too got this error below, but I am on Python 3.6, would that be the cause?
RuntimeError: DataLoader worker (pid 8591) is killed by signal: Illegal instruction.

Trace reproduced below:
Traceback (most recent call last):
File "train.py", line 22, in
for i, data in enumerate(dataset):
File "/home/sam/Documents/ComputerVision/pytorch-CycleGAN-and-pix2pix/data/custom_dataset_data_loader.py", line 44, in iter
for i, data in enumerate(self.dataloader):
File "/home/sam/py36/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 275, in next
idx, batch = self._get_batch()
File "/home/sam/py36/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 254, in _get_batch
return self.data_queue.get()
File "/usr/lib/python3.6/multiprocessing/queues.py", line 335, in get
res = self._reader.recv_bytes()
File "/usr/lib/python3.6/multiprocessing/connection.py", line 216, in recv_bytes
buf = self._recv_bytes(maxlength)
File "/usr/lib/python3.6/multiprocessing/connection.py", line 407, in _recv_bytes
buf = self._recv(4)
File "/usr/lib/python3.6/multiprocessing/connection.py", line 379, in _recv
chunk = read(handle, remaining)
File "/home/sam/py36/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 175, in handler
_error_if_any_worker_fails()
RuntimeError: DataLoader worker (pid 8591) is killed by signal: Illegal instruction.

body:
I too got this error below, but I am on Python 3.6, would that be the cause?
RuntimeError: DataLoader worker (pid 8591) is killed by signal: Illegal instruction.

Trace reproduced below:
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "train.py", line 22, in <module>
    for i, data in enumerate(dataset):
  File "/home/sam/Documents/ComputerVision/pytorch-CycleGAN-and-pix2pix/data/custom_dataset_data_loader.py", line 44, in __iter__
    for i, data in enumerate(self.dataloader):
  File "/home/sam/py36/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 275, in __next__
    idx, batch = self._get_batch()
  File "/home/sam/py36/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 254, in _get_batch
    return self.data_queue.get()
  File "/usr/lib/python3.6/multiprocessing/queues.py", line 335, in get
    res = self._reader.recv_bytes()
  File "/usr/lib/python3.6/multiprocessing/connection.py", line 216, in recv_bytes
    buf = self._recv_bytes(maxlength)
  File "/usr/lib/python3.6/multiprocessing/connection.py", line 407, in _recv_bytes
    buf = self._recv(4)
  File "/usr/lib/python3.6/multiprocessing/connection.py", line 379, in _recv
    chunk = read(handle, remaining)
  File "/home/sam/py36/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 175, in handler
    _error_if_any_worker_fails()
RuntimeError: DataLoader worker (pid 8591) is killed by signal: Illegal instruction.
